articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Turkey says it won't evacuate NW Syria observation posts
articles.description: Turkey is saying it won't evacuate its troops from the dozen observation posts it holds in rebel-held northwestern Syria
articles.content:
ANKARA, Turkey -- 
Turkey's defense chief said Sunday that his country's troops won't evacuate their 12 observation posts in rebel-held northwestern Syria. That's even as a Syrian government offensive pushed deeper into Idlib province, the last remaining opp… [+2344 chars]

articles.author: YURI KAGEYAMA Associated Press
articles.title: Suspected North Korean boat with bodies found in Japan
articles.description: The Japanese coast guard says a boat with several bodies and suspected of being from North Korea has been found on a small island in northern Japan
articles.content:
TOKYO -- 
A boat suspected of being from North Korea with several bodies was found on a small island in northern Japan, the Japanese Coast Guard said Sunday.
The wrecked boat that had the decomposing bodies was found on Sado Island in Niigata prefecture on … [+1220 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 2 ex-prime ministers vie for Guinea-Bissau presidency
articles.description: Two former prime ministers are vying to become president of Guinea-Bissau in a runoff election
articles.content:
BISSAU, Guinea-Bissau -- 
Two former prime ministers of Guinea-Bissau are vying for the presidency in a runoff election Sunday after the incumbent failed to reach the second round in the tumultuous West African country once described by the United Nations as… [+1833 chars]

articles.author: NASSER NASSER Associated Press
articles.title: Iraqi artists pay tribute to dead protesters with sculptures
articles.description: An Iraqi artist is paying tribute to killed anti-government protesters with sculptures made by young Iraqis he has trained for free
articles.content:
BAGHDAD -- 
The sculptures carved by seven art trainees were lined up outside a makeshift workshop in Baghdads Tahrir Square. With them were posters depicting protesters who have been killed in anti-government demonstrations in the past three months.
One sc… [+2169 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Girl, 13, killed in North Carolina mall parking lot shooting
articles.description: Police say a shooting in a North Carolina mall's parking lot left a 13-year-old girl dead and two boys hurt
articles.content:
CONCORD, N.C. -- 
A 13-year-old girl was killed in a shooting at a North Carolina mall parking lot and two other juveniles were hurt, police said.
Concord police responded to a call about a fight outside a Dave and Buster's at Concord Mills mall Saturday ni… [+509 chars]
